info.title: Capsule CRM
info.description: Online CRM for individuals, small businesses and sales teams wanting a simple, effective and affordable solution.

get.description: This operation triggers when a new opportunity is created in your account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add an opportunity.

get.description: This operation triggers when an existing opportunity is updated in your account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, update an existing opportunity.

get.description: This operation triggers when a task is created in your account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, add a task.

get.description: This operation triggers when a new party is created in your account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a party.

get.description: This operation triggers when a new party is created in your account.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a party.

get.description: This operation retrieves a list of all opportunities in your Capsule account.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new opportunity in your account.

get.description: This operation is used to retrieve all information about an opportunity.

post.description: This operation is used to update information about an existing opportunity.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete an existing opportunity.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new person in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to create a new person in your Capsule account.

put.description: This operation is used to update the information about an existing person in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to update the information about an existing person in your Capsule account.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new organisation in your Capsule account.

put.description: This operation is used to update information about an existing organisation.

get.description: This operation is used to retrieve a list of all parties in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of all parties in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of all people in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of all people in your Capsule account.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of all organisations in your account.
This operation retrieves all information about an existing party.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a party from your account.

get.description: This operation retrieves all information about an existing party.
This operation is used to retrieve a list of tasks.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new task.

put.description: This operation is used to complete a task.

get.description: This operation returns a list of milestones.
This operation returns a list of currencies.

completedBy.description: Username of the person who completed this task.

owner.description: User the task is assigned to.

party.description: Represents a person or organisation in Capsule.

pictureURL.description: Url that represents the location of the profile picture for this party.

complete.description: True if the milestone is complete.

organisation.description: Organisation the party is associated with.

id.description: The unique id of the organisation.
